alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto; Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 10:53PM CDT until May 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN PARKER AND PALO PINTO COUNTIES... At 1050 PM CDT, a pair of severe thunderstorms were in Palo Pinto County. One storm was near Mineral Wells, and the other was near Palo Pinto Mountains State Park. Both were moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Severe storms will be near... Cool around 1115 PM CDT. Gordon around 1130 PM CDT. Lake Palo Pinto around 1155 PM CDT. Palo Pinto around 1200 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
